definition: Hungary/Hungarian/abbr. for 匈牙利[Xiong1 ya2 li4]

sentences.english: Hungarian-language schools teach Slovak remarkably badly.
sentences.chinese: 匈牙利語學校教的斯洛伐克語一塌糊塗。

sentences.english: Hungarians put surnames first for all purposes, at least in the Hungarian language.
sentences.chinese: 匈牙利人總是將姓放在前面，至少在匈牙利語中如此。

sentences.english: The desire to have a better understanding of Hungarian impels me to study hard .
sentences.chinese: 對更好掌握匈牙利語的渴望促使我去努力學習。

sentences.english: Yinsen : He is speaking Hungarian, I don't.
sentences.chinese: 他說的是匈牙利語，我不會。
